Preterit.turoyo: hat ʕal d-aṯət w-mxabállux-li w-lə=tlelux meni, qum izúx mobel-e l-ruḥux, w-məṯnáḥ m-u=taʕb-ano 244; 47/14;
translations: Since you have come, have reported [this] to me and have not hidden yourself from me, go and take [the treasure] and rest from this trouble

Imperativ.turoyo: izolux mxabár ḥoli, amár k-aṯi Naro! 248; 69/569;
translations: geh und benachrichtige meinen Onkel, sage: Naro ist gekommen
